name: telegram_bulk_send
description: Send a message to multiple Telegram chats in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling telegram_send_message multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all chat names as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: chat_names
parameters.description: Comma-separated chat, group, or channel names to send the message to

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message text to send to each chat

steps.label: Send to each chat in parallel

detailSteps.code: const chatName = `{{@item.name}}`; const searchInput = document.querySelector('.input-search input') || document.querySelector('input[type="text"]'); if (searchInput) { searchInput.focus(); searchInput.click(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 300)); searchInput.value = ''; searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); document.execCommand('insertText', false, chatName); searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); } return { searched: chatName }
detailSteps.name: search_chat
detailSteps.label: Search for chat

detailSteps.code: const chatName = `{{@item.name}}`; const chatItems = document.querySelectorAll('.chatlist-chat, .chat-list .ListItem, .search-group .chatlist-chat'); let clicked = false; for (const item of chatItems) { const nameEl = item.querySelector('.peer-title, .user-title, .dialog-title'); if (nameEl && nameEl.textContent.trim().toLowerCase().includes(chatName.toLowerCase())) { item.click(); clicked = true; break; } } if (!clicked && chatItems.length > 0) { chatItems[0].click(); clicked = true; } return { clicked: clicked, chat: chatName }
detailSteps.name: click_chat
detailSteps.label: Click matching chat

detailSteps.code: const el = document.querySelector('.input-message-input[contenteditable="true"]') || document.querySelector('[contenteditable="true"].input-message-input'); if (!el) return { status: 'input_not_found', chat: `{{@item.name}}` }; el.focus(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 300)); document.execCommand('insertText', false, `{{message}}`); el.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 500)); const sendBtn = document.querySelector('.btn-send, .send-btn, button.btn-icon.send'); if (sendBtn) { sendBtn.click(); } else { el.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, bubbles: true })); } return { status: 'sent', chat: `{{@item.name}}` }
detailSteps.name: send_result
detailSteps.label: Type and send message
